"Luster Class Aptitude Test III":
"This is a test to judge whether an ARKS
is suitable for the Luster class. This will
allow you to bypass the ability restriction.
This quest is for those who desire further
improvement of their skills and abilities.

※Defeat Lv.61~ enemies with a Gunslash
as a Luster only.
※Luster's level cap increases to 100."

"Luster Level Cap License IV~V
＋4 Luster Skill Points"
